last_episode_to_air.name: See You Tomorrow, Joon Young
last_episode_to_air.overview: The news reports a shocking video that mysteriously appeared on the internet. Meanwhile, Jun-young's memory loss is quickly worsening.

name: Uncontrollably Fond
overview: When Shin Joon-young and No-eul were children, they were separated and became heartbroken. As adults they meet again. Shin Joon-young is now a top actor and singer. He is intelligent and attractive. No-eul is the PD of documentaries. She values money over justice and kisses up to those with more power than her.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The memory of their painful breakup still fresh in their minds, two former lovers reunite years later as a top actor and a documentary producer.

tagline: What should I do if he really likes me?

episodes.name: Do You Not Recognise Me?
episodes.overview: Top actor Sin Jun-young has a sudden change of heart and refuses to die in the last episode of his show -- for a reason that no one else knows about.

episodes.name: Joon Young and Eul in High School
episodes.overview: In a flashback to 2006, high schooler Jun-young learns why his mom had to raise him alone. Eul, also in high school, witnesses a terrible accident.

episodes.name: Let's See What Happens to Us
episodes.overview: Jun-young's manager finds out about Eul's dire financial state and tells Jun-young, who tries not to be concerned but can't help thinking about her.

episodes.name: You Don't Love Me
episodes.overview: Eul visits Jun-young to discuss the documentary, but he changes his mind -- again. Ji-tae is dating Jeong-eun despite having no feelings for her.

episodes.name: I Lost My Job and Got Dumped
episodes.overview: Eul puts herself at risk of getting fired from the documentary crew. Later, she half-jokingly confesses her feelings to Hyeon-u.

episodes.name: Because of What You Did, I Can't Be With Eul
episodes.overview: With Jun-young and Eul making headlines, Jun-young is nowhere to be found. His management is frantically looking, but not even Eul knows where he is.

episodes.name: I Tried My Best to Run Away
episodes.overview: Jun-young's sudden change in attitude toward Eul has her convinced she made a mistake while drunk, but she can't remember what she did wrong.

episodes.name: She's the Girl I Like
episodes.overview: Jun-young is intent on winning Eul's heart. He runs into Ji-tae while visiting Eul and begins to sense something suspicious about Ji-tae.

episodes.name: Tell Dad the Truth
episodes.overview: With everyone thinking Jun-young is dating Yu-na, Eul continues to shoot her documentary. Ji-tae urges his mom to tell Dad the truth about everything.

episodes.name: Shin Joon Young Saved Him
episodes.overview: After a phone argument with his mom, Jun-young ditches the K-Pop Festival and spots Eul driving a van, speeding toward Choi Hyeon-jun.

episodes.name: Don't Give in to Shin Joon Young's Threat
episodes.overview: Ji-tae asks his father to release Eul. Jun-young tells his mom about the things Choi Hyeon-jun did to Eul years ago and why he quit law school.

episodes.name: Let's Give Up
episodes.overview: Jun-young plans to reclaim justice for Eul by exposing her dad's real killer. Jeong-eun gets extremely distraught when Ji-tae doesn't show up.

episodes.name: That Room Isn't for a Regular Employee
episodes.overview: Eul is hurt by Jun-young's cold demeanor. Ji-tae's mother informs him that Jeong-eun will take over his director status, but he seems unconcerned.

episodes.name: I Won't See Ji Tae Ever Again
episodes.overview: Jeong-eun visits Jun-young to turn down his necklace gift but faces embarrassment. Ji-tae's mother hands Eul money, telling her to get away from Ji-tae.

episodes.name: I Want Compensation
episodes.overview: Jun-young asks Jeong-eun to try and seduce him. Ji-tae tries to see Eul, but she won't meet him. Eul visits Jun-young to say goodbye.

episodes.name: Leave the Revenge to Me
episodes.overview: Jun-young's doctor calls him to say Eul came by to ask about his condition. Eul wishes to rejoin the documentary team, but Jun-young pushes her away.

episodes.name: Tell Me It's Not True
episodes.overview: Angry that Jeong-eun got stood up by Ji-tae, her father intends to cut all ties with his family but learns that she is already dating someone else.

episodes.name: Eul, Are You Watching?
episodes.overview: As Eul watches on, Jun-young completes his first -- which is also his last -- item on his bucket list. Soon after, the police arrive to arrest him.

episodes.name: Let's Live Here Just for 500 Years
episodes.overview: Eul hands over the USB containing the video of Jeong-eun and Jun-young to Choi Hyeon-jun, asking him to return it before the scheduled airing.

episodes.name: See You Tomorrow, Joon Young
episodes.overview: The news reports a shocking video that mysteriously appeared on the internet. Meanwhile, Jun-young's memory loss is quickly worsening.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The memory of their painful breakup still fresh in their minds, two former lovers reunite years later as a top actor and a documentary producer.
